Reviews.Title: Know your needs, then you'll know what to buy
Reviews.Author: Sui Lin Chee "Sui Lin Chee"
Reviews.Content: People, I looked at this because it's a $13 item, but you have to understand what you need and the mount's upper limits so it won't disappoint you and waste your time.The mount description says max. VESA 300 x 260.  This generally means a HDTV up to about 40" (200 x 200).  I checked several 39"-40" HDTV's and they use 200 x 200. (My situation is a 32" back-lit LED LCD @ 10 lbs, very light).The width of the mount is about 13" (337mm) so it won't span 2 studs (@ 16" center), but most NEW (2012 models) are in the 20-30lb range (CCFL's are at the higher weight spectrum while back-lit 40" can weight as little as 20lb w/o stand).  As such, you can use 4 drywall plastic anchors (which were provided with my unit).  For concrete or cement walls, I would suggest lead anchors which were NOT provided.If you are able to position the mount over 1 stud (2 screws), and 2 other screws in drywall or plasterboard, and the HDTV is less than say 35 lbs, I think you would be safe for the long run.Since I don't have a 42" TV, I don't know if those sets transition to 400 x 400 (one Walmart Sanyo 42" @ 33lb needs 400 x 400) so I would say the mount manufacturer is being too liberal in describing it suitable for 42" and up to 88lbs.Bottom line, this is cheap & good mount for up to 40" (200 x 200) and up to 30 lbs (my guess, if no stud); ove 30 lbs, I would look for 1 stud before buying this mount.  If you meet this, $13 and you're good to go.  If 42" or more, or rated at 400 x 400, step up to the $25 mounts (look for free shipping) from other Amazon "basic mount" sellers -- the non-adjustable mounts are about 30mm from the wall, and the adjustable tilts are further out to provide needed clearance.The steel is of the right heft gauge for the newer, lighter weight TV's, and the mounting screws seem complete.

Reviews.Title: For 10 bucks it does the trick.
Reviews.Author: S. Whitaker "superman1979"
Reviews.Content: Most the people reviewing this mount didnt do their research.  Not all tv's have the same vesa pattern.  It would hold the weight of a 42 inch tv as long as the vesa pattern on the tv is within the specs of the mount.  It also mention its length, so those complaining it wont reach your studs should have read the product description.  I bought it for a 32" in sceptre tv I wanted wall mounted in my work out room.  The sceptre ways about 25lbs,  I mounted it to 1 stud with two lag bolts and 4 heavy duty dry wall anchors that are rated to 265lbs each.  This mount inst going anywhere.  Also the bubble level on mine was actually accurate. It comes with some various hardware to mount the tv.  I didnt use any though.  Went to the hardware store and got some stronger hardware for about 2 bucks.  also since the mount is so small it doesnt block any ports my 32 inch sceptre.  The only negative i have is that one of the arms "prongs?"  that hang on the mount, was a little bent. I bent it back.  Cant complaing though,  I mean come on, it was $10.

Reviews.Title: Fills the bill
Reviews.Author: jimster
Reviews.Content: I needed a slim bracket for a stationary mount for a 32" LCD.  This one is great, esp for the price.  Easy to mount, allows one to easily hang & remove the TV, includes a handy set of screws & whatnot, plus a built in level.  Instructions are unclear, but this isn't hard to figure out (use the photo on the box).  I mounted this on the side of a metal file cabinet, so cannot speak to stud alignment issues.

Reviews.Title: For cement walls only
Reviews.Author: santor
Reviews.Content: The installation guide says that this bracket can only be used on solid cement or hardwood walls. That's because the wall bracket is only 12" and can't span across 2 wall studs and they only provide cement anchors. This should have been stated in the item description.I am returning it today.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Jet
Reviews.Content: Received on day promised. Easy to mount on wall. Fit a 32 inch flat screen TV with no problem. I have seen the same type of wall mount priced up to four times the cost of this one. This is a real bargain. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Quick easy and good quality
Reviews.Author: T. Shuee
Reviews.Content: very easy to assemble and nice that it has the self leveler built in.  I may have to order another for the mother in law!

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Ron Acosta
Reviews.Content: It was so easy to install as it comes with a built-in level gauge. It looks sturdy and it mounts close to the wall.

Reviews.Title: just what I thought I would get
Reviews.Author: robojo
Reviews.Content: This product was easy to install , inexpensive and I got it fast . i didnt drive from store to store looking for what I needed. I got home form work and it was sitting waiting for me to install mt sons 32" tv. I had it up in 5 minutes!

Reviews.Title: Quick arrival, easy install
Reviews.Author: Chris Mills
Reviews.Content: This was a perfect, inexpensive wall mount for my 40" LED TV. Arrived quickly and an easy install. It may have taken 30 min tops to get the TV up and ready to go. The mount is slim and keeps it close to the wall for minimal gap. the only draw back being that if you are using anything but an HDMI cable the cables will bend against the wall.

Reviews.Title: Nice Mounting System
Reviews.Author: Joseph Nocella
Reviews.Content: This mounting bracket is fine for my 32" TV. Included were various screws for different TVs. They included the screws for my TV which was a nice surprise. It was easy to install. The built-in leveler is a nice feature. I had the TV on the wall in 15 minutes.  I would definitely recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly for 32" tv
Reviews.Author: Darlene Chapman
Reviews.Content: BF loved that it had it's own leveler! Went up easily and it worked perfectly for our Isignia 32" tv.

Reviews.Title: It does the job!!
Reviews.Author: Jason Hamilton
Reviews.Content: This is the second one i purchased for our church to hang our T.V's in our kids classes and in the our auditorium.  It is inexpensive and does the job.  I will get another when we add more classrooms!!  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: BHoward
Reviews.Content: Was easy to use and worked great for our daughter's tv!  She loves the look of the TV on the wall too and it makes it safer than having it on a stand.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit
Reviews.Author: Raul A Daley
Reviews.Content: Relatively inexpensive , quite durable, and considerable easy to install, due to the bubble level, only basic mechanical or cunstruction skills are required.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Romanista "Totti"
Reviews.Content: Good and sturdy, not for big TV's. I rent so I cannot drill crap around that much, but unless you have a "real" wall don't put anything bigger than 32 inches. The mount can hold it, the wall is the only concern.

Reviews.Title: Very short from stud to stud
Reviews.Author: Jeffery J. Boyd Jr.
Reviews.Content: The wall bracket is shorter than what I expected . It doesn't reach from stud to stud. Other than that it's ok

Reviews.Title: sucks!
Reviews.Author: kp
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my 42" tv. It did not fit this mount is way too small I do not recomend it. The price is cheap, but the product is even cheaper. waiste of $$$$.

Reviews.Title: Missing An Important Detail in Description!!!
Reviews.Author: Jason Noble
Reviews.Content: Here's an important piece of information that probably should be on the product description somewhere: This mount is designed to mount on concrete walls ONLY! It says that in the instructions but nowhere in the description. The fact that it's only about a foot wide means that it won't span two wall studs so that you could mount it on a typical, sheetrock wall. So, if you are planning on mounting this to a concrete wall, it's probably a good mount. It's just not very universal since most people have houses with sheetrock walls.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Only about 12 inches wide.  Will not even hit wall stud.  I may be ok for a 26 inch tv or less but nothing larger.  Brackets not even wide enough to mount of tv.  Basically junk.

Reviews.Title: need a super thin tv
Reviews.Author: ktr
Reviews.Content: you have to have a SUPER THIN TV for this to work.  will not work on LCD or most LED's ..  if your tv has a big back on it or any inputs on the back and not on the side.. DONT GET.  will not work.Had to get a different mount.

Reviews.Title: small, simple, and clean
Reviews.Author: Artherious
Reviews.Content: I installed this mount in 10 minutes (did not use built in level because it was off). I have a Hisense 40 LED Smart TV and fits with some wiggle room. Very pleased with purchase and will buy form this company again.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and poor design.
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This was junk.  It holds the tv so close to the wall that you can't connect the TV to a power source or cable.  The brackets that attach to the TV which are in a standard location, cover the HDMI inputs on the TV.  Do not buy!

Reviews.Title: will only mount to concrete walls
Reviews.Author: eric s
Reviews.Content: the item only says will mount tv 15-42, it does not say in the description or on the box that it only mounts to concrete walland is not wide enough to span studs

Reviews.Title: doesn't fit
Reviews.Author: Brandt
Reviews.Content: It doesn't fit my 32" Samsung TV.  The screws are too small to screw into the back of the TV, and the screw holes in the mount are too small to just buy the right screws.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The mount seemed a bit small and it said for concrete walls.  I put it thru my studs and it held really good for my 23 inch.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done. Yes, it can mount 42" tv but, measure your tv bolts on the back. Spaces must be within specs of this mount.
Reviews.Author: Miguel Quintanilla
Reviews.Content: This wall mount exceeded my expections. Some reviews say it cant be used for a 42" tv well guess they were wrong. I messured my back mounting holes and they were within the range this mount could hold. The package comes with all necessary hardware. You have to mount it to wooden stud or cement wall for safe secure placement. The only faultwas the built in level. I'ts best to use your own. Otherwise this wall mount is a 5 star!!

Reviews.Title: good item and arrived as described.
Reviews.Author: Chris Mathews
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son for his bedroom TV. Very low profile and sits flat on the wall. I would buy this again. arrived very quickly from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Allie_says_so
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, very sturdy! Definitely recommend! These are perfect for hanging your TV easily. Save yourself some dough and order yours here!

Reviews.Title: Should have known
Reviews.Author: njrapid
Reviews.Content: Ok.So the level is to the left.I never trust `built in levels` on anything but c`mon,shouldn`t the level be centered? The bracket was `level` according to the level but not really.I whipped out my own and had to remount. The screws included are minimal and not for every tv and had to dig through my arsenal of screws to adapt it. I know its not the best quality when it`s this cheap but the extra time it cost me to remount and find the proper hardware I could have bought better and been better off.Avoid if you can.

Reviews.Title: Only one complaint
Reviews.Author: Philip Davis "Cwafty"
Reviews.Content: Three stars because it's very difficult to get clearance to tighten down the locking screws. Upon using this I also thought it would be helpful when hooking up A.V. equipment to make this swivel up and down.

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: trucker
Reviews.Content: it does what its supposed to do.  hung my tv on the wall and cleared off my dresser with this

Reviews.Title: Only fits small TVs
Reviews.Author: Durward Ferland
Reviews.Content: The description says that it will fit 15 to 42 inch TVs; however, the holes on the mount are very close together and in actuality it will only fit very small televisions. I wanted to use this on a 37 inch TV and it didn't come anywhere near close to fitting.

Reviews.Title: Too small to fit 42" Samsung Plasma TV
Reviews.Author: JT Blues "JT Goff"
Reviews.Content: Nice product but did not fit my 42" Samsung plasma screen TV. It just didn't match up to the wholes on the TV. So this isn't a universal mount.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Mike Jewett
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time but the description was incomplete. It was listed as universal but was designed for a mason wall and a wood plate had to be installed on the wall so the bracket could screw to it. The brackets also had to modified to work for the TV we had.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Good wall mount even better price tho,The level it has made it a lot easier to mount it right

Reviews.Title: Keep it small
Reviews.Author: Michael Anthony Colletti
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 one for a 19" and one for a 40" on the upper and lower end of the range.  Works good for a small tv.  Not as stable as I would like for the bigger one, mostly because it needs to be wider in oder to hit two studs to support the heavier tv.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Patricia Larson
Reviews.Content: I was very upset to find that this wall mount is for cement walls. There was nothing in the description stating that it was for cement walls.  I would have returned it but by the time I paid to return it and then the restock fee, it was not worth it!!  Hopefully I can get a little for it at a yard sale.

Reviews.Title: Vonhauss by designer habitat ultra slim tv wall mount
Reviews.Author: clytie Bernard
Reviews.Content: the wall mount was exactly what I needed, was on time, the wall tv stand is very light and was very easy to install.  vey well. Thank you

Reviews.Title: easy to intsall
Reviews.Author: skn
Reviews.Content: works great, easy install .  The built in level helps on the install. no issue's I bought two of them

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: name pen
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up.  Worked with my TV fine. Plenty of options so I am sure it works with just about any TV

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: Nicole Westhoff
Reviews.Content: Bought this received it quickly and installed it myself!!! Super easy directions. Plus it's light weight so as a girl, I had NO issues. YAY!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't fit as advertised
Reviews.Author: stanley langston
Reviews.Content: Specifications weren't listed for mounting bracket width and the listing said that it go up to a 42". I have a 32" viore and it didn't fit. The widest it goes is 14".Check out the width of the tv's mounting screw inserts. Also the screws sent were too long and I would have to use a spacer. I returned to the seller and he credited my account promptly.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: moodygirl
Reviews.Content: I like these mounts I am using them for dual monitors. It looks like they are really made for concrete or some other system, I ended up buying additional screws and anchors for mounting into sheet rock but they are excellent and very easy to install.  I will probably purchase a few more for smaller TVs in the bathroom and kitchen

Reviews.Title: Very nice product!
Reviews.Author: Elva O
Reviews.Content: Very nice and sturdy. We made this work using one of the studs in the wall. It is made for concrete, but we just bought special screws that can hold up to 80lbs each. We love it.

Reviews.Title: Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: Jason Pritchard
Reviews.Content: Says it's good for upto a 42" led or lcd TV. It is not. I have a 42" Vizio, this is way too small for it. However, it does fit a 32" Emerson in my kids room. So for the price I'm keeping it. Though I do believe it to be mismarked.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: booknerdsarecool
Reviews.Content: I have a larger one to hang my 55 inch, but needed another one for my 32 inch so i ordered this one. It was easy to put up and there's even a measure that comes with it to make sure that it's not crooked which made it even more awesome. It's affordable, sturdy, and was delivered fairly quickly.

Reviews.Title: low cost and easy to install
Reviews.Author: Gunnar Nettleship
Reviews.Content: This is a great mount if you are just looking to mount a TV. It is no frills, but really, do you seriously need all that tilt and swivel stuff? I know I didn't. The only issue I had with it was the mounting anchors. They were crap at holding onto the drywall. Fortunately I had some better anchors at my disposal. I only needed 1, as you really do want to make sure you are mounting to at least 1 stud. TV's are not super light… but you know this

Reviews.Title: Simple, right price, set screw tough to reach.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Golden
Reviews.Content: Does what is says... Its simple and basic... Just fine for my older 32" Samsung which is on the heavy side for 32" TVs nowadays.  A little hard to reach the set screw once the tv was installed and on the mount - need a long screw driver and its basically a blind screw to get at.

Reviews.Title: It worked for me.
Reviews.Author: bama4oar
Reviews.Content: I used this for the 32 inch oCosmo 720p tv I bought through amazon. There's no fluff to it, but it was easy to install and my tv is still hanging on the wall! I also loved the built in level, it made it really easy to hang.

Reviews.Title: Simple, yet effective
Reviews.Author: Eric J. Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Using it to mount a 32" LCD TV.  Very easy to install, came with all the hardware needed, and it's very well made.

Reviews.Title: Works but would get a different unit if I had to do over
Reviews.Author: J. Smith "MacJoe"
Reviews.Content: So the big draw of this mount is that its inexpensive.  It mounted my 32" with no problem.  Mounted one side to stud and another view the in-wall plug and no concerns about staying on the wall.... so that is fineThe negative is that there is absolutely no adjustment of horizontal alignment with this thing.  Its very difficult to get it perfectly aligned horizontally, included level and all.  Once the TV is mounted, the eye is able to catch even a fraction of a inch of offset alignment, which the mount makes no provision to adjust.  If I had it to do over again, I'd have spent a little more and gotten with with post mount adjustment capabilities

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: petevon
Reviews.Content: I had to modify the bolts that hold the 32 inch flat screen tv to the brackets because they were way too long.  Other than that its holding my tv on a pine panel wall fine. I used my own screws to mount it too the wall too. You can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount and works perfectly fine.  I am happy with this purchase. I would recommend this product and plan on buying it for other flat screens that I will have in the future.

Reviews.Title: Attention to Detail
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Must have missed it only  spans  for a 12" mounting, great for solid wall  but not wall studs, had to make a connecting bracket to work, but for the cost easy enough...

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I needed!
Reviews.Author: Ktzdahdee
Reviews.Content: First off, IT WAS $15.00!! I had done some remodeling and put a 2x8 up between the studs before drywall JUST for ease of TV mounting. Score one for advance planning!Only "problem" I ran into was, UNIT IS SLIM! Was not able to use HDMI #1 port on my TV as it faces directly to the back. No biggie. Using side port.  VERY HAPPY with purchase!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Arnold Arias
Reviews.Content: It has an leveler to let you know it's truly horizontal. It is very sturdy. I'd especially recomended for flatscreens in old residential buildings.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: ThunderStick
Reviews.Content: Great deal, I mounted this to a drywall wall after going to the hardware store and purchasing drywall anchors for $2.00.  Seriously that is all it took and now our 32" tv is securely mounted to the wall and looks great.  The built in level helps with installation.  The light construction is nothing to discourage you.  Most LCD TV's don't way that much to begin with and to think you really need some sturdy anchors in the wall is being overly cautious.  A standard dry wall anchor hold up to 30 lbs, I found some that can hold up to 150lbs.  My 32" tv weighs just 30lbs.  My 55" LCD weighs just 60lbs.  So knowing this mount is designed to accommodate TV's only up to 42", it is safe to say that anchoring it to drywall is safe.

Reviews.Title: Be careful
Reviews.Author: Jeff Manbeck
Reviews.Content: I used this for a 24 inch TV into drywall and it works just fine.  I wouldn't recommend using this with a TV any bigger than 26" though if you aren't mounting it on a concrete wall.The only annoyance is there isn't much room for cables at all.  Luckily, all the ports I need are on the side of the TV.  If I needed to use ones in the back, there wouldn't be enough room.So for some TVs this would be great, but I would definitely check what your needs are and make sure this is OK to use for more reasons than just size.

Reviews.Title: So Far so good!
Reviews.Author: Roydrick T. Austin "R T Austin"
Reviews.Content: I mounted my 36" LED on it and it seems to be doing the job. The only drawback I would give it is the main bracket is broken into two pieces.

Reviews.Title: TV mount
Reviews.Author: Emily Groh
Reviews.Content: Good and sturdy. Was kinda difficult to put up because you have to put one side up at a time and then the middle bracket. But other than that it's great price and sturdy

Reviews.Title: DID NOT FIT TV!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I have a 39' tv.  This product did not fit, as the screw holes on the back of the tv were too wide for the mount.  This mount is not very versatile and will only fit tv's with very narrow configuration of holes.  Great price, poor design.

Reviews.Title: Beware
Reviews.Author: Viktoria
Reviews.Content: I could not use this product at all.  First,  the item is ONLY for use with concrete walls.  Who has concrete walls???  Second,  it doesn't even span the size of the tv it is listed as being used for. Third,  the holes and screws don't match my tv.  It doesn't seem logical that any tv as large as these say they will hs wld have hole that close to the center but this item isn't even long enough to reach the holes.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: sheri
Reviews.Content: Very good and priced right....  sits close to the wall.  The only neg is it should be 16" wide instead of 14"  to attach to studs on a standard wall but I had plywood,,  so no problem

Reviews.Title: Does not work on my LG TV
Reviews.Author: Paperboy
Reviews.Content: Despite being advertised as a universal mount, the pattern does not fit the screws on the back of my 42 inch LG TV. It is made of good quality materials so it is pretty heavy and unfortunately I would lose half the price on return shipping.

Reviews.Title: Utilitarian
Reviews.Author: Eric Owen
Reviews.Content: this mount serves the purpose but it is really much flimsier than I expected. The built in level is a nice feature but the whole thing on the wall is rather flimsy. Granted I guess you get what you pay for and it was a very inexpensive mount. I wish I would have opted for a little sturdier mount but I've got what I ordered.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Barbara E. Hayes
Reviews.Content: My daughter gave me a TV for Christmas and I wanted to mount it on the wall.  This mount was perfect.  It was so easy to hang the TV.  Love the level on it.  It arrived right on time.

Reviews.Title: picture perfect
Reviews.Author: Keith Jackson
Reviews.Content: easy install, great for smaller TV's. the leveler was great added bonus. instructions and screws that were supplied covered all the bases

Reviews.Title: Not one piece fit
Reviews.Author: S. Tiller
Reviews.Content: Bracket is too narrow for the TVWall Anchors are larger than the screws providedscrews for TV back were larger than the bracket allowedThis thing is a disaster...cheaper in this case literally means cheaper....

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this
Reviews.Author: AnthonyH
Reviews.Content: It is tiny, and wouldn't even fit on my 32" TV. The entire wall mount is just 12" wide, and the mounts on my 32" tv were too wide to work with this mount. It may work great for a small computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: wallmount
Reviews.Author: Michael Bennett
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install. Need a long screwdriver to tighten after setting the tv. Will buy another one again soon

Reviews.Title: Very Nice and durable wall mount tv
Reviews.Author: maxi
Reviews.Content: This wall mount tv is perfect for my 32" Samsung TV.  I will recommend to anyone. Price was incredibly cheap and compare with best buy TV mounts

Reviews.Title: Great Wall mount
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Yagen
Reviews.Content: Great product! Definitely worth the price, was cheap but definitely does a job for my 30 inch tv in my room

Reviews.Title: Doesnt fit my flat screen
Reviews.Author: Michaela
Reviews.Content: Don't expect it to fit 39' inch flat screens because me and my dad tried and it didnt fit mine.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: April McCoy
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with the price, ease of putting it up and the shipping! I would recommend this for anyone.

Reviews.Title: well made, german engineering
Reviews.Author: Pao
Reviews.Content: exceptionally made, all parts well done and included, built in level even! Husband thought it was unbelieveably well made considering its cost.

Reviews.Title: grest
Reviews.Author: Darrin
Reviews.Content: Second one I've ordered and still great. Once installed properly I never have to worry about it coming down, totalky secured. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: For half the price of any other TV wall mount, I got all of the functionality I needed. Obviously won't work for someone who wants to be able to tilt their television, but in my case it never really comes up as an issue. The built-in level was a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Max Bozeman
Reviews.Content: But doesn't come close to fitting the 42" by a long shot. Fortunately my son got a 32" as part of his Christmas and it fit nicely. Also, the included bolts/screws for mounting the hardware are for concrete walls.  They do not work in drywall.  Home Depot and $5 solved this issue.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Gregoria Vega
Reviews.Content: Quality is number one and the fit was just perfect. Now our bedroom is complete. Just what we need. Smile :)

Reviews.Title: VonHaus by Designer Habitat.TV wall mount.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I gave this the highest ranking I could because I got exactly what I ordered. It was a great price and worked just as good as ones I seen in the past for 10 times as much. Received In a couple of days from offing . Thank youMark Mitchell

Reviews.Title: Unit was too light
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Techie1"
Reviews.Content: The unit was delivered on time but the holding screws for the tv bracket were bent. They could be straightened for use but we decided to use another type bracket form VonHaus with angled brackets. This product may have worked well for smaller TVs but we didn't want to take the chance.

Reviews.Title: awesome thanks
Reviews.Author: Ramiro
Reviews.Content: Works great held up our 37 inch although it could use extra washers in case of longer or shorter screws

Reviews.Title: Wall Mount Works!
Reviews.Author: janet campbell
Reviews.Content: I received this order so quickly, and is a cinch to install. My mother received a 24 inch flat screen for Christmas and it looks lovely mounted on the wall. Thank you designer VonHaus by Designer Haitat and Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Steal of  a Deal
Reviews.Author: Turbulent k
Reviews.Content: Item was simple to install , very nice and worth every penny. -1 star is because of the tight spot from the wall to my TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Mount.
Reviews.Author: Dany Delgado
Reviews.Content: I ordered this mount for my 39" flat screen T.V. Mount is very easy to install and the T.V fits perfectly on it. My only dislike about this mount is that it fits very closely to the T.V that is is very hard to tighten the safety screw on the bottom of the mount. I've even tried to use my 18" long screw driver to tighten the safety screw and it was very difficult to get to it. All in all it's a good wall mount and the T.V sits nice a flush to the wall where the mount can't be seem form the sides of the T.V.

Reviews.Title: just right
Reviews.Author: T. Burger
Reviews.Content: Hung a 32" Samsung in my daughters room works just as advertised pretty easy job and I am no handyman. Would definatly buy again

Reviews.Title: Works as promised
Reviews.Author: JustSherman
Reviews.Content: Product came quick & worked as described, this is for concrete wall but I used it on sheetrock for a 24 inch screen  in my son's room.

Reviews.Title: Great simple TV mount.
Reviews.Author: Bryan Eckert
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure about the reviews stating you can't mount this on a sheetrock wall, because you can, I did (although I hit studs).Yes, it's 12" wide. Yes, mine came with drywall anchors. Read the description, this is meant to mount a 15" TV - which is narrower than 16". If the mount was wider it would protrude past the TV. Most people should be able to hit at least one wall stud with the mount.That said, I would not use those plastic anchors I would use toggle locks or truss head anchors, either of which will hold 100lbs with just one.As far as the mount, it's pretty simple. Just attach to the wall (included bubble level is great). Screw the hangers on your TV, and hang on the mount. Then screw the lock screws on the bottom of the hangers (need a long screwdriver for this) Literally takes 5 minutes.While this is not heavy duty gauge by any means, it was able to hold me up on the wall no problem. My TV won't be coming down until I take it down. Most new TV's will weigh 10lbs or so. Also, the TV mounts very close to the wall, less than 1" away. Make sure your cables can flex or you can use a 90 degree adapter if your HDMI ports are pointed straight back.

Reviews.Title: save some money!
Reviews.Author: L. Long
Reviews.Content: Best buy has cheapest bracket for 59$ - real money maker for them - ordered this for a Vizio 32" LCD and worked very well and saved 45$!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good, but could stand to be wider for stud mounting
Reviews.Author: Sam "Eagle 85"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these to hang 32" TVs in the bedrooms.  While they are heavy-duty, and should easily keep the lightweight LED TVs on the wall for many years, I only wish they were wider.  The "perfect" mounting point is never exactly between two studs, and unless you are wanting to rip up a wall to put in braces, you MUST use the plastic anchors to mount to the dry-wall only.  Mounting this way, I'm sure you won't be able to hang a heavy TV, and if you rent, you'll not get any love from your landlord for having to drill four huge holes into the wall... a little wall-mud won't fix these holes!My second gripe is that even though the VESA mounting of these TVs was 200x200, there is not a lot of "wiggle-room" left/right for centering onto the wall, so make sure you hang the base-plate as close to perfect as you can... you'll only have a couple inches of adjustment on the mount.  If you're using this to hang a 320x200 VESA, you'll have to be perfect in positioning of the mount, because you'll have zero room for adjustment.On the bright-side, the "level" on mine was actually more accurate than some I've hung in the past (with level on the outer edges).  I checked level with my large, carpenter's level, and it was spot-on, but I did anchor the far-side first, and used the level to validate position before tightening down the bolts.

Reviews.Title: Not Universal
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This does not properly fit a 29 inch LCD flat screen by Vizio. The brackets are to long and stick out above the top while still partially blocking some of the ports. The screws included are far to long to tighten those same brackets to the TV. I'll either have to make a run to the hardware store or throw this piece of crap out. As for peoples concerns about mounting it to the wall. I hit 1 stud with 2 of the lags along with a couple of drywall anchors on the other side to hold it level is more then strong enough to hold up these small TV's in the 12-30lb range.

Reviews.Title: ultra slim wall mount
Reviews.Author: Viroon Ujjin
Reviews.Content: love the slim design to hide the bracket and kept TV close to the wall. Very easy to install. Great price comparing to off the shelf items.

Reviews.Title: Bought for a 42 inch phillips lcd tv
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Bought it for a Philips 42 inch lcd tv, but the mountings screw hole pattern is way larger than this mounting rack.  I was skeptical before I opened the box, but once I had it out, I was wondering if it would fit a 32 inch tv.

Reviews.Title: BS
Reviews.Author: kbstimp
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my 39" TV and it is too small to actually work for my TV.  It said it would work with up to a 42" TV.  The problem is that the part you brace against the wall isn't long enough.  The brackets go on the back of the TV just fine, but are spaced too far apart for this to actually work.  You need to measure the distance between the screw holes on the back of your TV to ensure this product will work for you.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Jeremy A.
Reviews.Content: bought this for kids for Christmas the kids seem to really like this bought it for my son and he cant stop playing with it.

Reviews.Title: Nice and easy
Reviews.Author: David Yanes
Reviews.Content: Very light, very easy to install, good price, in a few words!!! Great TV wall mounting bracket!! It only took me 5 mins t install it!

Reviews.Title: Idiot Alert
Reviews.Author: Samuel Scruggs Jr.
Reviews.Content: For the idiots that can't read what was clearly on the description - Yes, it will not span the distance of two studs. But it doesn't need to. You can hit one stud, and use drywall anchors for the other side. One stud with two lag bolts can hold 300lbs. This mount works fine and unlike some mounts that bend it's sold.

Reviews.Title: best bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: gary garcia
Reviews.Content: its super small, but it gets the job done, for the price it is good, would not recommend if u have kids around, they might yank it down, if u dont touch it or move it no problems..

Reviews.Title: You Need Drywall Anchors!
Reviews.Author: A. Johnston "Zenophobe"
Reviews.Content: Mount works as needed but if you don't have a wooden backing you will need Drywall Anchors. My stud spacing is approx 24" and I needed this in the middle of the spacing. Got TOGGLER 20-Pack Plastic Toggle 5/8-in to 3/4-in Drywall Anchor with #8 x 1-3/4-in Screws (might be a touch small) but got the job done. Only rating a 3 because of the lack of documentation of the large screw size. (assumed Metric #14) and the lack of drywall anchors being that most walls will not have stud spacing of 12" or a cross beam to screw into where it is needed.I reused my LCD's (Dell 2709) mount screws as the washers included in the kit for a smaller VESA mount where almost too big and I didn't feel comfortable using them with the included washers.The built in level is nice.Pros:CheapWell builtQuick InstallCons:Poor Documentation about stud spacing and drywall use.No Drywall AnchorsWashers ID too large for small VESA screwsLack of screw size on the Large Plate Mount Screws (assumes Metric #13-14) took a metric #13 socket to tighten.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Emanuel Chiaburu
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit because I needed a cheap solution for my basement TV. I also liked the built-in level. Overall, I am pretty disappointed with this unit. I was unable to anchor it onto the wall studs because the mount is shorter than the distance between the wall studs. The drywall is not strong enough to hold my older style 32" TV. The mounting instructions are not detailed enough. Also, the lock-in mechanism does not seem 100% secure.

Reviews.Title: Great fit
Reviews.Author: Tony Harrison "Be kind to one another, tender...
Reviews.Content: It was a tight fit on my Vizio 32inch TV.The profile is small but I added some extensions to my TV to bring it out away from the wall about 1 inch just so that I would have more room for my cables but it really would have worked fine without the extensions.I really like this as it being 1 piece and not two for the main bracket plate that mounts onto the wall. I've used two before in the past and its horrible and hard to level.Only took me 5 minutes to put up and have my TV hanging on the wall.Later this year I will buy a Sony 42inch 3D TV and replace the Vizio but this mount still should work fine.

Reviews.Title: Bracket is not wide enough to span standard 16 inch span between studs
Reviews.Author: Carl L. Malmquist "Carl"
Reviews.Content: The instructions for this mount are nearly all just the manufacturer covering their @$$.  If you follow their instructions, the bracket must be mounted on a concrete wall with the capacity to support 300Kg.  There is no mention of attaching this mount to a wall with studs, so any warranty provided by the manufacturer is void for 99% of the people trying to use this mount, including me.The bracket that mounts to the wall is not wide enought to reach two studs, so, to use this mount on a framed wall with studs, it is necessary to first attach the mount to a board that is wide enough to reach two studs.The screws that attach the mount to the TV were too long, so I had to use washers.Other than needing a board and washers, the installation went reasonably well.  I can't not recommend this mount, but be aware of its limitations before purchasing it.

Reviews.Title: Keep looking
Reviews.Author: Kenneth J. Bodle
Reviews.Content: Fits a 42" TV my a$$! Don't waste your time with this junk. Wall mount is about 12" wide. In summary this is junk.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product at a great price
Reviews.Author: Shawn Endecott
Reviews.Content: This wall mount worked perfect for our Samsung 32" TV,  Was installed in minutes and looks great.  Bought another and gifted it.

Reviews.Title: Good wall mount, if you know its limitations.
Reviews.Author: Kalispell Copy Center
Reviews.Content: I bought this wall mount to hang a Samsung 32" TV (UN32F5500AFXZA) on the wall.  I had read on other reviews that the bracket is only about 13" wide, and wont stretch from one stud to the next.  But given my TV only weighs 11lbs, I wasn't too concerned by this - and figured I could catch one stud.  I did find a stud in the middle of it, then used 2 - 40lb drywall anchors on each end of it and I feel its is very secure.  And after looking at the instructions and included hardware I believe this bracket is only designed to be installed on solid masonry walls.  They wall anchored that are included are the masonry type.  But given how light my TV is, mounting it on drywall wasn't an issue.One issue I did have with it was the screws to hold the rails onto the back of the TV where all too small.  Largest screw they included was a 7Mx1.00, and after dragging my TV to the hardware store and screwing around I figured out that a Samsung UN32F5500AFXZA TV needs 8M x 1.25 screws.  Ended up with some 20mm long hex bolts that did the trick.  But I did have to force them through the holes in the rails as they where to large.Oh, and the bubble level that is mounted on it did work!  Was rather surprised.

Reviews.Title: cheap and not worth the headache
Reviews.Author: dee
Reviews.Content: wall screw's to big will cause a lot of damage to much to do for a simple wall mount don't waist you're money

Reviews.Title: great little tv mount
Reviews.Author: kenny vu
Reviews.Content: i bought this to mount my 27" tv.  Works great.  I used two screws into stud and two drywall anchors as the mount is not long enough to span over two studs.  The built in level is nice.  The whole process took 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent
Reviews.Author: Danny "Danny"
Reviews.Content: Good price while it is strong enough to hold my tv. Some screws did not fit on my tv but at least I figured out a way to put up the tv. Good price and strong enough to do its job.

Reviews.Title: very good buy
Reviews.Author: desmond washington
Reviews.Content: I JUST GOT THIS TODAY... FIRST OF ALL...DON'T LISTEN TO ANY OF THESE IDIOTS THAT SAY YOU CANT PLUG IN YOUR CABLES THATS WHY YOU HAVE TO PLUG THEM IN FIRST...SECOND...I HAVE A 32 INCH TV AND IT SITS PERFECTLY.....WHEN YOU PUT THE TV ON THE BLACK PIECE THATS ON THE WALL YOU HAVE TO SCREW THOSE LONG SCREWS UNDER THE TV TIGHTLY SO IT WONT MOVE..MAY HAVE TO BUY A LONG SCREW DRIVER..TV ISN'T GOING ANYWHERE AFTER THAT..ND ITS SUPPOSED TO TILT IF POSSIBLE JUST IN CASE YOU WANT TO PLUG SOMETHING ELSE UP TO IT SO DONT WORRY ABOUT IT...

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my project
Reviews.Author: L. Henry Wood
Reviews.Content: Exactly as advertised. Well made and quite easy to mount. Certainly can't beat the price. The unit was purchased to wall mount in a small quest bedroom a 23" LCD TV with 100mmX100mm mounting sockets. The smallest screws supplied were a bit too long, so I used 3 (each screw) - 1/8X9/16 fender washers as spacers and they worked perfectly. The bracket is mounted on 3/4" cherry tongue and groove paneling, so I went with four #10X3/4" Phillips pan head sheet metal screws with 1/8X9/16 Fender washers. This mount is solid as a rock and way overkill for this puny TV. I used my better grade level and found the one attached to the mount to be quite accurate. The entire unit is completely invisible behind the TV...and would be so down to a 20" with no problems.For those mounting to sheetrock (drywall) and have concerns about the unit staying put, I suggest using standard hollow wall anchors if a stud isn't available. They will easily support the max weight of this TV mount, rest assured. Drill your holes, insert the expansion unit and then use a Fender washer for the screw. The extra diameter washer size will better span the mounting bracket slots and provide a snug fit on the screw as well. All are available at your nearest TrueValue, Ace, Lowe's, etc. and other usual usual suspects.This one is a no-brainer. Good luck and enjoy your new wall mounted TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Product.... Easy install
Reviews.Author: James S. Urquhart
Reviews.Content: SOOO easy to install.Wish I had known about cheap mounts years ago I've been buying TV stands or paying people to mount them.15 minutes TOPS.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Jim Steele
Reviews.Content: Nice low profile to the wall. Make sure that if you put your outlets behind the tv, you watch their placement because of how close it is to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Robust design
Reviews.Author: Benutzer
Reviews.Content: <16" width does not allow fixing to 2 studs. The user must use at least 2 provided wallboard inserts. And as advertised it is slim. Must connect all cable to TV before mounting

Reviews.Title: NICE PRICE WORKED GREAT
Reviews.Author: Spark
Reviews.Content: great price !!  my tv is 32" and weight is under 20lbs a couple nice screws into one stud works just fine... just what was needed

Reviews.Title: Keep the tv small
Reviews.Author: Ken M.
Reviews.Content: It's OKAY.....if you don't go any larger than a 24 inch tv.....tried to use it on my 38 inch....useless.  Used it on a couple of 24 inch and was OK.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy, well-built, easy to install
Reviews.Author: Francis E. Martin "Mav"
Reviews.Content: Simple and easy to install. It is well built and no doubt will hold a 42" TV with no problem. I think the hefty lag bolts that came with it may be overkill but better safe than sorry.  This mount the TV very close to the wall, which i wanted for my my application. After installation I decided I needed a tilt unit instead.  I found the same manufacturer and bought their tilt unit. That one is as impressive as this one. Sturdy, well-built, easy to install. What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Quick and Easy
Reviews.Author: David A.
Reviews.Content: This was a very sturdy low profile mount that was easy to install.  I was even able to easily lower the TV placement without needing to reinstall the mount or fear that it would not support the weight, if I used a different level of the bracket.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't actually fit size rating
Reviews.Author: Nikkiren
Reviews.Content: I have a 40" Westinghouse LCD TV. This product would not fit my TV, the mounts would not support how far apart the holes were on the back of my TV. Save yourself the headache and guess work and buy a mount that has 4 brackets (2 to attach to the TV, and 2 to attach to the wall as opposed to this one that has 3: 2 to attach to the TV, but only one to attach to the wall). That way you know that you can set your brackets wherever you need them and it will work.

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: Joe H Stanley
Reviews.Content: Good product, easy to install. Works as advertised. Holds the TV on the wall. I bought two of them. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Ultra Slim TV Wall Mount
Reviews.Author: sandiq
Reviews.Content: Worked great. I had to cut one of the vertical parts shorter as it covered up the AC plug on the TV. Lots of hardware. I was mounting a 22" Vivio TV.

Reviews.Title: nice, but almost too slim
Reviews.Author: MS "M"
Reviews.Content: had to buy another set of bolts to work with this because it was so slim I struggled to get my tv mounted to it.

Reviews.Title: Go with a different Mount- You get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Lopez
Reviews.Content: The screws provided to attach the brackets to the back of the TV are not the correct size for my 36" Samsung smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: April Swentzel
Reviews.Content: No complaints. Exactly what I expected it to be. Sturdy and was easy to install. Will order another one if ever needed.

Reviews.Title: Did not work for my TV
Reviews.Author: Christian
Reviews.Content: Nothing wrong with the bracket, but the bracket holes for my TV are too far apart for the brace that mounts on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Very nice item for the money
Reviews.Author: John P. Wagoner
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice item for the money. I bought this for my moms tv and I installed it for her. Is works very well.

Reviews.Title: small tv wall mount
Reviews.Author: Charles Volk
Reviews.Content: product worked well but the screw holes were off just enough to make it a small challenge but overall works well

Reviews.Title: Loved it but it didn't work
Reviews.Author: Larry Tate JR
Reviews.Content: The tv bracket was very slim and would have fit perfect, but the holes did not align with my current tv, so I had to send the brackets back.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Joel G. Hancock "JGHancock"
Reviews.Content: Great product at a great price -- I have 5 wall mounts and this is the easiest to install I have ever used.

Reviews.Title: it does the job
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It does the job and is a good price. I did have to buy a few extra anchors but overall met up with its description and compared to others i checked out was a better value.

Reviews.Title: In Full View
Reviews.Author: Pam Grant
Reviews.Content: The wall mount was an excellent value and exceeded both the quality and expectation and has served its purpose beautifully. I told friends and family about the quality and the value.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL!
Reviews.Author: sooners1011
Reviews.Content: This wall mount was insanely difficult to mount. My boyfriend and his father spent ove an hour just trying to fit the mount perfectly onto the wall with the TV on it. The mount and the screws are not the right size for each other so the screws don't go deep enough into the wall to even have a stable mount.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: White Dove "Love"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this wall mount for our 32" tv and it looks and worked great! If you don't want a bulky wall mount this ultra slim wall mount is perfect.

Reviews.Title: It didn't fit my new 22"Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Diego Potes
Reviews.Content: When I was trying to fit the bracket to the TV, the holes on the bracket didn't match the ones on the TV. The TV has a design defect on the bottom (the base holder is a little bit wider on the back) that doesn't allow to fit properly. But I think these guys also don't have in mind the new Samsung TV models, specially the small ones.

Reviews.Title: Great Support for my LED
Reviews.Author: vinaygupta
Reviews.Content: it is good and light in wieght and material strength is good and cheaper from various stand available in market

Reviews.Title: Does the job.
Reviews.Author: Rex Furball
Reviews.Content: I was mounting a 32" TV which only weighed 15lbs so this mount worked fine. As previous reviewers have stated it is only 13" so it can not hit 2 studs. So I just hit one stud with the supplied bolts and used wall anchors and different screws to balance it. Expect a run to the hardware store since the bolts were too long to mount in the back of my TV. Oh they shorted me one of the too long screws. It is cheaply made but the price it is worth it. I would buy it again for 32" TVs.

Reviews.Title: i wish i know before, wound have save money this what i been looking for..
Reviews.Author: fresh fruit (dj sauve)
Reviews.Content: if your a mobile dj this is lite and the best for up and down.wow.just what I need for set up and down for my t.v.'sgreat bang for the bucket..thank you

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: mattpyles
Reviews.Content: Sure it's just a wall mount, but I didn't realize how much better it would make my room. The product itself was easy to install, and sits flush with the wall. Cheap, that's the best part, as in inexpensive.

Reviews.Title: works just as described
Reviews.Author: teamjt "JT"
Reviews.Content: Yes it is sheet metal.  It is very strong.  The design is well thought out, and installs very easily.  I checked the built in spirit level against one of my own, and found it to be a touch low on the left, but very close.  I used my own level, but I don't think I would have been disappointed with the results using the provided one.  the installation hardware was perfect, and I didn't feel the need to replace any of it.  If my set falls off the wall in the next year I'll update the review, but It is pretty solid.

Reviews.Title: Actually does a goodj ob
Reviews.Author: Brittany Lisonbee
Reviews.Content: I really like this. I was worried for 10 bucks it wouldn't work or hold our 42 inch but it works just fine and holds the tv up no problem. Cant beat that for 10 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Power for the TV
Reviews.Author: C. R. Wilde
Reviews.Content: Be careful when buying this bracket. One of the two bars that mount on the back of the TV covered the hole for the power.  I could not use this bracket.  Not recommended for 22 inch or smaller TVs.

Reviews.Title: Ultra Slim wall mount LCD / LED
Reviews.Author: KENANTHONYREPAIR
Reviews.Content: I found this product to work very well for my needvery easy to set up in mins. Mount your flat screen like a prothe way we have to save now do to the economy  you can't go wrongshopping around for what you want at a very good deal.This item is just right for the do it your self personLadys yes you can do it to.Like always if you are going to mount any large flat screen  LCD / LED TV(ITS NICE TO HAVE ANOTHER PERSON WITH YOU WHEN WORKING ON YOUR PROJECT)

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: MMH434 "MH"
Reviews.Content: Do you know how hard it is to find mounting hardware for any TV under 24 inches?  Shesh.  found it, love it, good for the boat, and sturdy!

Reviews.Title: Slim-yes, Ultra Slim-maybe
Reviews.Author: A Careful DIYer
Reviews.Content: This was no more slim then competitive "slim' models.  The mount does not span two wall standard 17" gapped wall studs.  Since I was mounting a 32" LCD TV I was not too worried.  I would not have used this mounting my 42" Plasma.  Level was handy.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Mark C Hampson
Reviews.Content: Holding 32" LCD/LED TV. Would have been 5* but level is way off, and bracket is only 12 long, hence needs some work to mount on standard 16" center stud wall.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't fit 37 inch
Reviews.Author: Mike Muehlenfeld
Reviews.Content: It says it hangs up to 37 and unfortunately I tried 37 so it didn't fit.  We worked around it and it does do the job.

Reviews.Title: Will not fit Haier LEC19B1320 19-Inch 720p LCD HDTV DVD Combo
Reviews.Author: L'Ami du peuple
Reviews.Content: ...due to the location of the power outlet on the Haier. Otherwise, this product is solid, the integrated level a plus, and will mount your HDTV very close to the wall. Disappointed I couldn't use it!

Reviews.Title: mrd
Reviews.Author: mrd
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent product, and for the money, I love it.It is very nice product and the price is very low, compare with the stores.

Reviews.Title: Small but functions well
Reviews.Author: Dgarl
Reviews.Content: This Slim TV Wall mount had me fooled for a moment, I've installed about 20 LCD televisions and never seen one this small. The price is execellent and it ended up working great. Would purchase more

Reviews.Title: Simple and easy
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: You can't ask for a better price and is very easy to install. Solid construction with a built-in level.  I recommended.

Reviews.Title: Good basic wall mount
Reviews.Author: Carl West
Reviews.Content: OK for a basic mount. Does not tilt but is sturdy and fits the bill for a basic wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Very Sturdy Mount
Reviews.Author: jd35lr "J Dye"
Reviews.Content: Great price, less $20 including shipping. It has a built in level and includes all hardware needed for mounting. It worked well with the 200 x 200 VESA mounting for the 32" TV used. It should mount most flat screens up to 40". Weight will not be a problem for this very sturdy product.

Reviews.Title: Good for small Flatscreen.
Reviews.Author: Vickie Campanelli
Reviews.Content: This item was easy to install, and works great for camera monitor that is flatscreen I would reccomend for smaller TV.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: very good product, I recommend it, I'll keep trying and more before I comment if I'm still satisfied with this product

Reviews.Title: Served it's purpose
Reviews.Author: Tone Capone
Reviews.Content: Well it is what it is... a wall mount... It came on time... it holds my TV on the wall... I'm satisfied.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: A. George "papa georgio"
Reviews.Content: jus installed today and works great level feature is nice very close to the wall so takes up almost no space

Reviews.Title: says will fit 42" tv's, but it wont.
Reviews.Author: allyn jones
Reviews.Content: says will fit 42" tv's, but it wont.tried it on my samsung 42", not even close.works great for smaller tv's.(around 26")

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk DON"T BUY..
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: This was the worst thing I have ever gotten online.  It looks like it's for hanging a kids toy TV.

Reviews.Title: This is not what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Daniela
Reviews.Content: When this item arrived I thought it was way too small and indeed, although they are saying this if for TV's up to 42" I don't think that can be possible because my 32" was not able to be placed onto the bracket since the HDTV cable stick out further than the wall mount and the TV sits tilted. We tried different ways but did not work. I would have preferred to buy it somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: excellent for the price.
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: i give it only 3 out of 5 because it's not wide enough to span across a standard 16" wall stud spacing.  I'll have to remount it later most likely.  BUT it fits my 32" phillips flat panel perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Way too small - Beware
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This mount says it fits 99% of tvs up to 42", but it's only about 12" wide and wouldn't fit the 32" I was trying to use it for or even the 24" tvs I was looking at getting soon.Probably good for a 19" or a computer monitor, but that's about it. The build seems sturdy if you can find a tv it will work with.

Reviews.Title: Great. Do a good job with an unbeatable price
Reviews.Author: Michael T
Reviews.Content: Well you cannot find any wall mount with just 7 bucks and do the job well like this one. It easy and take me ~20 minutes to set up everything. Bought it together with my Coby 32', not too bad for both of them.5 star....Will update if bad thing happen....

Reviews.Title: Not a bad mount- but check dimensions before installing it.
Reviews.Author: Philip J. Pollina
Reviews.Content: Carefully measured, leveled and drilled the holes- any easy process.  Added the brackets to the back of my 32" Vizio LCD- went to hang it and... it was too small! The wall mount was too narrow to fit both the brackets on the TV. My advise, eyeball it before installing it.

Reviews.Title: Won't fit 40" Televisiony
Reviews.Author: Matthew B. Teeters
Reviews.Content: POS... I wanted to hang my TV tonight and now, well, now I can't. I am so peeved right now but there is no one to blame and I don't want to take this out on my dog. Alas, now my only course of repercussion is to grade you as a one star product; slowly degrading your product rating over the course of time. Eventually, based upon my review your creator shall wallow in regret knowing that he failed me.That said, this would be fine for a much smaller television.  Like, a TV for ants.  Seriously, this thing is little; I've taken dumps bigger than this mount.

Reviews.Title: too cheap
Reviews.Author: Greg Turner
Reviews.Content: the screws did not fit in my tv... and the wall mount was very flimsy. My husband decided to go out and buy a better one because he was disappointed with this.

Reviews.Title: dont buy this
Reviews.Author: sheila rooker
Reviews.Content: Awful does not work on a 42 inch TV or even a 32 inch TV after working hard to get it up the bars wouldn't even fit on the rack please don't buy

Reviews.Title: Perfect if not using on drywall!
Reviews.Author: Delta9
Reviews.Content: Bought this on black Friday for $9.99 to mount my 40 Ocosmo TV.  I have wooden walls (lake cabin), so the 13" span was of no concern to me.  I actually prefer it to be smaller/ less visible.  Mounted it yesterday with much ease. About 3-5 minutes from opening it up, to stepping back to see how it looked. Easily holds the weight of my 40" TV.  Always check your vesa bolt pattern size  on desired TV and compare to mount before purchasing ANY wall mount. *Warning-Will not span the average 16" stud spacing of drywall/ sheet rock!*

Reviews.Title: Not big enough for TVs over 30 inches, and can't hold enough weight.
Reviews.Author: MaskedMexican
Reviews.Content: The mount can't span across two studs in the wall and the vertical supports for the actual TV are not long enough for an actual TV, only monitors. I ordered it a few months ago and now I can't return it because it has been too long.

Reviews.Title: Too small
Reviews.Author: Courtney Hornyak
Reviews.Content: Way too small I dont know how that is suppose to hold a tv. make sure if you are ordering this that it is going on a cement wall wont reach in between wall beams I had to return mine poor product

Reviews.Title: Dont buy for  42"
Reviews.Author: ossiel
Reviews.Content: I did not like it because it did not fit my 42 inch tv so if you have a 42 inch dont buy it

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Joanie Cos-Y-Leon
Reviews.Content: This was perfect for our older flat screen and very versitile.Easy to install and you can slide TV from side to side if you like.

Reviews.Title: This work great in our camper
Reviews.Author: crazydog "crazydog"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for a little 19 inch tv mounted easy and fits really good, pretty solid and has held up on a long trip in our camper

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Payton
Reviews.Content: I bought this product and was having doubts. But when it came into action, it is awesome! You can not even see it!

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly and great value
Reviews.Author: WilliamT
Reviews.Content: Perfect mount for the money.  This mount was exactly what I needed for my 32".  It is well hidden but is very secure and stable.

Reviews.Title: It didn't fit!
Reviews.Author: bugs50
Reviews.Content: We bought it to hang our 32" flat screen and the horizontal bracket was too short.  It didn't meet the vertical brackets.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jason Bonnette
Reviews.Content: Worked well on a Vizio 32", Hugs close to the wall, had no problems installing it, took about 15 min.

Reviews.Title: Easy to hang
Reviews.Author: Keri Hill "hugakeribear"
Reviews.Content: easy to install, fast set up holds our 26 inch tv. hang in my daughter small room and this helped create a lot of space, she can adjust it for easy viewing

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Phyllis
Reviews.Content: This is a great wall mount it is durable and works great with the 32 inch lcd tv i used on the mount would get another one in the future.

Reviews.Title: Well Made.  Easy to install.
Reviews.Author: John K. Looze "JKL"
Reviews.Content: This is a very sturdy wall mount.  It even has a built in level, which is a very nice touch.  It would be even better if the instructions gave suggestions on how to deal with hanging it when it is not wide enough to reach two 16" studs.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Rossi
Reviews.Content: If you have a 32" TV you want to hang on the wall without much difficulty this is a very good value. Also it makes it so the rack is well hidden.

Reviews.Title: Works as it Should
Reviews.Author: B.K.
Reviews.Content: Works as it should and the built-in level was a help.  It's probablly overkill for a 22" LED LCD, but I'm all for that.  Holds it pretty close to the wall so you may have trouble if your TV has inputs that would have a cable stick directly out of the back, but it's a slim wall mount so that should be expected.

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Detweiler
Reviews.Content: The mount is great for the price. It is very low profile, so if u have to plug cords into the back, which I do it gets a bit tight. And it's so close I can not secure the final screws that lock the TV to the mount. It still works without the screws tightened but if u lift up on the TV it will come right off.

ProductInfo.Features:
Ultra low profile: measures just 27mm from the wall
This Bracket is will fit most makes and models of TV within the stated size range (15" to 42") Max VESA Dimensions W300 x H260mm
For wall mounting LED, LCD, 3D and Plasma televisions
Super Strong Load Capacity rated to 88lbs
Quick and easy to install - bracket comes complete with full instructions (In English Only) and FREE FITTING HARDWARE
ProductInfo.Name: VonHaus by Designer Habitat Ultra Slim TV Wall Mount for 15"-42" LCD LED 3D Plasma TVs Super Strong 88lbs Weight Capacity
